author: Alex Marquardt and Jennifer Hansler, CNN
title: US push to include 'Wuhan virus' language in G7 joint statement fractures alliance
description: A push by the US State Department to include the phrase "Wuhan virus" in a joint statement with other Group of Seven members following a meeting of foreign ministers on coronavirus on Wednesday was rejected, resulting in separate statements and division in th…
